description: Research-based policy rules with 2021+ AI/ML advances in quantitative finance

ai_research_basis.llm_applications: GPT-4 achieves 60% earnings prediction accuracy (U. Chicago 2024), outperforming human analysts (53-57%)
ai_research_basis.rag_for_alpha: RAG systems identify short-term market inefficiencies by combining qualitative sentiment with quantitative modeling (AlphaFin 2024)
ai_research_basis.chain_of_thought: CoT prompting significantly improves LLM performance on complex financial reasoning (FinCoT 2024)
ai_research_basis.agent_based_trading: LLM-based trading agents demonstrate consistent strategy adherence and realistic market dynamics (NeurIPS 2024)

rules.action: Add more signals or improve signal construction. Consider using LLM-based sentiment analysis or RAG to augment traditional signals.
rules.research_basis: Grinold & Kahn (2000): IC 0.05-0.10 typical for good factors. Enhanced by LLM sentiment analysis (2023-2024)
rules.ai_enhancement: Use RAG to retrieve relevant news/social media sentiment for signal augmentation

rules.action: Implement position sizing, volatility targeting, or regime-aware risk management using LLM-based market regime detection
rules.research_basis: Calmar ratio best practice. Enhanced by LLM-based risk modeling (RiskLabs 2024)
rules.ai_enhancement: Use multimodal LLMs to predict VaR and market volatility from text+audio+time-series

rules.action: Reduce rebalance frequency to weekly/monthly. Use LLM-based trade execution optimization.
rules.research_basis: Frazzini et al. (2018): Transaction costs eliminate 50%+ of gross alpha
rules.ai_enhancement: Apply prompt engineering to optimize trade timing and reduce market impact

rules.action: Improve signal quality using Chain-of-Thought reasoning for multi-step factor construction. Target Sharpe > 1.8.
rules.research_basis: Institutional standards (AQR, Two Sigma). Enhanced by CoT prompting (FinCoT 2024)
rules.ai_enhancement: Use FinCoT framework for structured financial reasoning in factor design

rules.action: Add regime awareness using LLM-based economic simulation. Reduce lookback window to avoid overfitting.
rules.research_basis: Harvey et al. (2016): Stability critical. Enhanced by LLM agent simulations (Horton 2023)
rules.ai_enhancement: Use LLM agents ('Homo Silicus') to simulate market regimes and test factor robustness

rules.action: Momentum factors should achieve Sharpe > 2.0. Add volatility scaling and use LLM-based sentiment momentum.
rules.research_basis: Jegadeesh & Titman (1993, 2001): Momentum Sharpe 1.5-2.5. Enhanced by LLM sentiment (2023-2024)
rules.ai_enhancement: Combine price momentum with LLM-extracted sentiment momentum from news/social media

rules.action: IC volatility too high. Use RAG to retrieve historical patterns and smooth IC predictions.
rules.research_basis: Information Ratio = IC / IC_std. Enhanced by RAG for time-series forecasting (2024)
rules.ai_enhancement: Apply RAG framework to incorporate salient historical patterns for IC stabilization

rules.action: Turnover too high for scalability. Use LLM-based portfolio optimization to reduce turnover while maintaining alpha.
rules.research_basis: Pedersen (2015): High turnover limits AUM scalability
rules.ai_enhancement: Apply GPT-4 or Claude for portfolio optimization with turnover constraints

rules.action: Negative skew indicates tail risk. Use LLM-based anomaly detection to identify and hedge tail events.
rules.research_basis: Taleb (2007): Negative skew = black swan exposure. Enhanced by LLM anomaly detection (2024)
rules.ai_enhancement: Deploy multi-agent LLM framework for real-time anomaly detection

rules.action: Low hit rate suggests weak signal. Use LLM-based Q&A on financial reports to improve signal quality.
rules.research_basis: Statistical significance: 52%+ hit rate for p < 0.05. Enhanced by LLM financial Q&A (AlphaFin 2024)
rules.ai_enhancement: Apply RAG-based financial Q&A to extract alpha signals from earnings reports

rules.action: Modern factors should leverage LLM capabilities. Consider adding: sentiment analysis, earnings call analysis, or regime detection.
rules.research_basis: LLMs revolutionizing quant finance 2023-2024. GPT-4 60% earnings prediction accuracy (U. Chicago 2024)
rules.ai_enhancement: Integrate at least one LLM-based feature: sentiment, earnings prediction, or regime classification

rules.action: When using LLMs, apply Chain-of-Thought prompting for better reasoning. Use FinCoT framework for financial tasks.
rules.research_basis: CoT prompting significantly improves LLM performance on complex problems (2023-2024)
rules.ai_enhancement: Implement structured CoT prompts with step-by-step financial reasoning

rules.action: CRITICAL: Signal validation failed. Ensure signals have time variation, cross-sectional dispersion, and use .rank(axis=1, pct=True). Reject alpha immediately.
rules.research_basis: Grinold & Kahn (2000): Signals must vary both temporally and cross-sectionally to generate alpha
rules.ai_enhancement: Use LLM to analyze signal construction code and suggest improvements for variation

rules.condition: turnover_monthly == 0 OR avg_ic == 0 OR abs(kurt) > 30 OR split_sharpe_mean < -0.5
rules.action: CRITICAL: Backtest results unrealistic. Check: (1) turnover > 0, (2) IC != 0, (3) kurtosis < 30, (4) OOS Sharpe > -0.5. Reject alpha immediately.
rules.research_basis: Harvey et al. (2016): Realistic backtests require non-zero turnover, predictive IC, and stable OOS performance
rules.ai_enhancement: Use LLM to diagnose root cause of unrealistic results and suggest fixes

research_references: Harvey, Liu, Zhu (2016): ...and the Cross-Section of Expected Returns
Jegadeesh & Titman (1993): Returns to Buying Winners and Selling Losers

AlphaFin (2024): RAG for Stock Trend Prediction and Financial Q&A
FinCoT (2024): Structured Chain-of-Thought for Financial Reasoning
Horton (2023): LLMs as Economic Agents ('Homo Silicus')
RiskLabs (2024): Multimodal LLMs for Financial Risk Modeling
NeurIPS (2024): LLM-based Trading Agents for Portfolio Management
